content: साध् {vI.v} {c5c} <ab>P.</ab> (साध्नोति) {@--1@} To complete, finish, accomplish. {@--2@} To conquer. {vII.v} {c4c} <ab>P.</ab> (साध्यति) To be completed or accomplished. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To accomplish, effect, bring about, perform; अपि साधय साधयेप्सितं <ls>N. 2. 62</ls>; यावद्यते साधयितुं तवार्थं <ls>R. 5. 25</ls>, <ls>Ku. 2. 33.</ls> {@--2@} To complete, finish, conclude. {@--3@} To gain, secure, obtain; <ls>R. 17. 38</ls>, <ls>Ms. 6. 75.</ls> {@--4@} To prove, substantiate. {@--5@} To subdue, overpower, conquer (as a foe &c.), win over; न हि साम्ना न दानेन न भेदेन च पांडवाः . शक्याः साधयितुं <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--6@} To kill, destroy; सुग्रीवांतकमासेदुः साधयिष्याम इत्यरिं <ls>Bk. 7. 31.</ls> {@--7@} To learn, understand. {@--8@} To cure, heal. {@--9@} To go, depart, go one's way; साधयाम्यहमविघ्नमस्तु ते <ls>R. 11. 91</ls>; <ls>Ś. 1. 7</ls>; प्रायेण ण्यंतकः साधिर्गमेरर्थे प्रयुज्यते <ls>S. D.</ls> {@--10@} To recover (as a debt). {@--11@} To make perfect.
